title: My First Blog Post
content: Hey guys! Starting a blog. Hope you will continue reading in the future. Today I was learning React.js and it is a game-changer!

title: Hello, from Texas
content: Howdy! I just moved to Texas. It is great here and I'm excited to keep posting from this great state!

title: Check out this tutorial
content: Recently found this tutorial on YouTube. Highly recommended to help you learn coding. It comes from the content creator ABCLearnW/Me
